entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:31 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this evening then to light snow after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
